question:
Two newborn identical (monozygotic) twins without any genetic mutation or abnormalities will have the identical __:
1.Gender
2.Fingerprints
3.DNA
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Two newborn identical which are also monozygotic twins without any genetic mutation or abnormalities will have the identical Gender and DNA. Monozygotic twins are formed when one zygote and created with one egg and one sperm.
